transArray.content: Very hygienic and clean, the service is in place, and the breakfast is also very good.

Dear guests, hello! Thank you very much for your trust in our hotel and your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only by living well and eating well can you feel at home. Breakfast is served from 7 a.m. to 10 a.m., and we now offer pure water white porridge, freshly baked egg tarts, croissants and other delicious foods. We believe that with your support, we will continue to improve the quality of all aspects of the hotel to ensure that you Every time you stay, you will be happy and happy. All the hotel staff sincerely look forward to your coming again! wish you a happy life! Manager: Zhang Minghui
